name: opensign
tagline: A self-hosted platform for signing documents digitally
description: OpenSign is a self-hosted electronic document signing platform. It supports secure signature workflows, audit trails, and multi-user collaboration with a web-based UI, offering privacy-focused document signing.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Design multi-step approval processes with automated routing and notification systems

features.title: Template Management
features.description: Build reusable document templates with predefined signature fields and form elements

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution ensuring complete control over sensitive documents and signature data

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Sign and review documents on any device with responsive design and touch-optimized interfaces

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect with external systems through REST APIs for automated document generation and processing
